key.name: behavior-doubleclick
key.description: The action to take when doubleclicking an account in the treeview - valid values are "goto", "edit", and "copy".

key.name: clipboard-chain-username
key.summary: When copying password, also copy username (chained)
key.description: If set, Revelation will copy both the username and the password to the clipboard when pressing "Copy Password" one after the other (when username is pasted, the password is automatically copied).

key.name: file-autoload
key.description: If set, Revelation will automatically load a data file on startup. The file to open is specified in the "autoload_file" key.

key.name: file-autoload-file
key.summary: A file to autoload on startup
key.description: The full path to a file which Revelation should autoload when starting. The "autoload" key must also be set to true for this to work.

key.name: file-autolock
key.description: If set, Revelation will automatically lock the current file after a period of inactivity. The inactivity period is specified in the "autolock_timeout" key.

key.name: file-autolock-timeout
key.description: The number of minutes of inactivity before the data file is automatically locked. The "autolock" option must be enabled for this to take effect.

key.name: file-autosave
key.description: If set, Revelation will automatically save the data file when an entry is added, updated or removed.

key.name: launcher-creditcard
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching a creditcard account.

key.name: launcher-cryptokey
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching a encryption key account.

key.name: launcher-database
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching a database account.

key.name: launcher-door
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching a door account.

key.name: launcher-email
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching an email account.

key.name: launcher-ftp
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching an ftp account.

key.name: launcher-generic
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching a generic account.

key.name: launcher-phone
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching a phone account.

key.name: launcher-shell
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching a shell account.

key.name: launcher-remotedesktop
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching a remote desktop account.

key.name: launcher-website
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching a website account.

key.name: launcher-vnc
key.description: A command which will be executed when launching a VNC account.

key.name: passwordgen-length
key.description: The number of characters in generated passwords. A length less than 4 characters will be ignored.

key.name: passwordgen-punctuation
key.description: If set, punctuation characters will be also used to generate passwords.

key.name: view-pane-position
key.description: The initial position of the pane in the main application window, in pixels.

key.name: view-passwords
key.description: When set, passwords will be displayed in plain text. Turning this option off will obscure passwords with ******.

key.name: view-searchbar
key.description: When set, Revelation will display its searchbar.

key.name: view-statusbar
key.description: When set, Revelation will display its statusbar.

key.name: view-toolbar
key.description: When set, Revelation will display its toolbar.

key.name: view-toolbar-style
key.description: Sets the style of the toolbar items. "desktop" uses desktop default, "both" shows icons and text, "both-horiz" shows icons and important text, "icons" shows icons only, and "text" shows text only.

key.name: view-window-height
key.description: The initial height of the main window, in pixels.

key.name: view-window-position-x
key.description: The initial horizontal position of the main window, in pixels.

key.name: view-window-position-y
key.description: The initial vertical position of the main window, in pixels.

key.name: view-window-width
key.description: The initial width of the main window, in pixels.
